context: Commercial real estate investment firm managing $2B portfolio considering proptech integration to improve property management efficiency

request.purpose: Implement integrated proptech platform across 50 properties including IoT sensors, AI maintenance, and tenant apps
request.justification: Industry trend toward smart buildings with 25% operational cost reduction potential

decision_process.outcome: Selected 3 proptech platforms with proven ROI in commercial sector
Projected 3-year payback with 22% IRR and $12M annual savings
Developed 18-month implementation roadmap with minimal disruption
Identified mitigation strategies for cybersecurity and vendor dependency risks

business_impact.expected_outcome: 25% reduction in maintenance costs and 30% improvement in tenant satisfaction scores

lessons_learned: Pilot testing essential for proptech adoption, tenant communication critical for successful implementation
